backend/main.mo: Main Motoko backend actor implementing chatroom functionality with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage integration, and HTTP outcalls support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three requirements for redesigning the MessageInput component with new styling, maintaining existing functionality, and implementing conditional send button enablement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, chat interface, message handling, user profiles, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile support, and versioned script tag for production refresh control.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file uploads, Giphy GIF search with debouncing, trending GIFs display, and avatar removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll, reply functionality, message filtering to hide Creator messages without media, and scroll-to-message highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input (image, YouTube, Twitch, Twitter). Handles file uploads with progress tracking and Twitter widget embedding for previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker, and back-to-lobby button for chatroom views. Includes character limit progress indicator for username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter), voice message playback, pin/unpin functionality, and reply threading. Supports emoji reactions and message highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component with text area, media attachment support (image upload, video URLs, Twitter links), voice recording with timer, and validation for different media types. Handles upload progress and recording state.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) in an iframe with an unpin button, positioned at the top of the chat area.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale or empty chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, ensuring the lobby always loads correctly on first page load. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal for loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login, logout, and identity management using DFINITY's AuthClient. Includes a provider component and status tracking for the authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chatrooms, messages, user profiles, and reactions. Includes helper functions for username/userId management, query key normalization, and image compression.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom page component that fetches and displays a specific chatroom using route params, handles loading/error states, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that displays a searchable, filterable list of chatrooms with category badges, handles actor connection state, implements debounced search and client-side filtering, and includes a create chatroom dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties (border radius, shadows, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking three existing features related to redesigning the MessageInput component with styled buttons (image upload, microphone, send) and an auto-expanding textarea with conditional send button enablement.
